275a6(mdo): bu dum phur bcad kyang yid ni 'gro myi 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'i sa shugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas te bzod pa smra// gang / zhig chos rnams chu zla rgya 'ur mnyam zhing sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra/ 
275a7(mdo): rtogs nas myi myin srog ma yin zhing shed pu ldan pa ma yin mtho // byang chub dang ni sems can tshogs myi dmyigs kyang byang chub gzhan don brtson// tshul 'dir gang zhing skrag pa myed pa de ni brtson 'grus
275a8(mdo): mthal mar phyind// gang gi sems ni yul la chags pa myed cing the tsom yod myin la// sems can gzhan gi sems kyi spyod pa tus gsum gyurd pa'ang shes pa dang // gang sems gyod par/ 
275b1(mdo): gyurd pa gang yin bdud kyis myi shes pa// pha rol phyi nad thob bsam gtan dang ni mngon par shes la blo gros gnas// gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung kun nyan cing de bzhin 'dzin byed pa// / 
275b2(mdo): bsalang pa dpag tu myed par smras kyang 'thobs pa rgyun chad myi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can gyi ltung de ni gang du'ang gnas myed pa/ bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rtenang
275b3(mdo): gsum na dpal// gang zhig pha rold phyind pa'i pha rol gshegs kyang gshegs myin ma gshegs myin// gang zhig sems can gyod pa'i mthar phyi nad myi gnas g.yo ba myi mngal zhing // yon tan kun mthar gang phyi nad mo
275b4(mdo): tan rnams la rlom sems mya mnga' ba/ thub pa'i dbang po shag tusangs rgyas khyu mchog de la 'go bos 'thug/ 'od zer rnam dag nyi mas srin bu me khyer 'od rnams zi lad kyis mnan// 
275b5(mdo): mi lce rtse mthon bskal mtha'i me 'is sa la ji snyed yod pa sreg/ ri mchog ri rab kyis ni sa la yod pa'i ri kun zi lad kyis mnan/ shag kya khyu mchog su 'dis 'jig rtend gsum gi 'od gzhan zil
275b6(mdo): du brlag/ zhing brgya dag nas lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ji snyed pa// de dag gtso bo mkhyod kyi mdog dang gzi brjid kyis ni tshim par 'gyur// de dag smon lam ji ltar btab pa de lAm kun gyis mthun par
275b7(mdo): mthong // bdag cag gang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na ni 'dug par shes/ ji ltar ba gang gis gang rig de ltar khyod kyi gsung ni shinang tu 'jug/ srid pa gsum na skad rnams ji snyed ci mchis de dang mthun par 'jug/ 
275b8(mdo): dus kyi dus dab kyi rnams kyis ni sems kyi bsam pa bgrang nus srid// rngub pa'i gsung dbyangs chad myed nam mkha' 'dra 'di bgrang ba nus pa lags// nam mkha'i mtha' dpa' tshams kyi mthalam 'grang bar gyi nus
276a1(mdo): 'khor ba'i sngon gi mapalam nyid ni rnam par kun tu 'grang myi nus// nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'khor ba'i mtha' ni gyi 'os bgrang bar nus kyang srid/ sangs rgyas mkhyend dang ting 'dzin da
276a2(mdo): tshul khrims yul ni gang du'ang shes myi nus// gzhal yas bskul bar gang gis bsngags pa brjod par sla ba ma lags pa// khyu mchog dpag yas chos kyi dbang phyug 'drend pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo gang
276a3(mdo): dag shes dang mos pa sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa// de dag gis ni blo gros bsam yas rmad byang kun lhag 'dren pa mthong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad pa 'di
276a4(mdo): dag smras nas/ bar snang las babs te / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di daskad ces gsold to// gal te zhus nas zhu pa lung bstand
276a5(mdo): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzon sa pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// 
276a6(mdo): de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la/ 'di skad ces bka' sa lad to// rigs kyi khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
276a7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang mi 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de ngas lung bstand pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' baN+Dald pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
276a8(mdo): dpa' bre gros rgya mtshos/ 'di skad ces gsold rta// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind shin tu dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ ting nge
276b1(mdo): 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs papa 'chang rgya zhes bdag gis thos na/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpan
276b2(mdo): chen po rnams kyis shi nang tu dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'thob pa dang / na ji'i slad du shi nang tu dkar ba'i dri ma myed pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad
276b3(mdo): du gsol// ting nge 'dzind de la 'jug pa'i skar 'jug pa gang thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzind 'di 'thob cing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byangs chub mngon
276b4(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe dgas pas legs par bshad tu gsol// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276b5(mdo): chen po blo gros rgya ma tsho la 'di skad ces bka' bas yad to// skyes du dam pa legs so legs so// kye mardzi ba 'di bzang zhing dbyed pa 'di tshul bzhin yin te/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs pa
276b6(mdo): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shi nad tu dkar ba'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgyas ting po'i dzi nad 'di ji ltar 'thob pa dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par
276b7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar 'gyur ba ras bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'dra/ 
276b8(mdo): kyi sngar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' rtsa yad to// blo zas rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa bas brtand pa yin te/ dge ba'i bsam
277a1(mdo): pa dang ldan pa nges pa'i phung po la rab tu gnas pa / tshogs bsags pa dang / dbang po rno ba/ dge ba'i bshes nyan gis yongs su zi nad pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis brlabs pa/ rgyu'i stobs can
277a2(mdo): yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed/ sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong
277a3(mdo): zhing gsung snyand pa thos te/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang mthong zhing chags pa myed pa'i mkhyen pa yang thos la/ rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul 'am/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul gis
277a4(mdo): sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'ang mthong nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ dge ba'i
277a5(mdo): chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing / thams cad mkhyend pa'i / sems brjed pa myed pas/ sems yongs su dag pa rnal 'byo rang du byed do// de sems yongs su dag pas ting nge 'dzind yongs su/ 
277a6(mdo): dag pa rab tu 'grem tho// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu sonod pa/ ji tsam du yongs su dag pa dang / shi nad tu dkar ba dang / 'dzi
277a7(mdo): bu dang bral ba dang / skyon med par gyur pa 'a de srid du yongs su sbyangs na/ skyes bu mkhas pa nor bu rin po che la mkhas pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro// blo grol rgya mtshol de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal rigs 'phags
277a8(mdo): pas 'ams cad ma khyed par sems bskyed pa/ rin po ma bsrung nas/ bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kyi tsam na 'bring bu dang bral zhing / rlom sems kyi/ 
277b1(mdo): 'bring bu dang bral bar 'gyur ba de srid du/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsal yongs su sbyang ba bya ba dang / thos pa la mkhas pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pas/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems
277b2(mdo): bskyed pa rin po che yongs su sbyangs na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'du zhing / shi nad tu dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'odadi yang 'dre za zog/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na
277b3(mdo): rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che de ni/ rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par byung ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gser gi rigs dang / dngul gi rigs dang / shel kyi rigs dang / bye rur+ya'i rigs
277b4(mdo): dang / rdo'i snying po'i rigs dang / sug gi rigs dang / mu tigadamar mo'i rigs dang / ge sa ra'i rigs dang / dpal gi snying po'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shi nang
277b5(mdo): tu 'das nas/ tri ma myed cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'inor bu rin po che chen po'i rigs de las rin thang myed pa'i nor bu/ rin po cher gyu rad te/ de 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'is yongs
277b6(mdo): su spyad par 'gyur gyi/ de ma yin pa'i sems can ngan pa gzhan rnams kyi ma yin te/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od gang yin pa des ni/ de ma yin pa'i nor bu rin po che gzhan rnams kyi 'od mgo mog por byed do// zla
277b7(mdo): gros rgya mtsho la de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de yang / rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par byung ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ so so'i skye bo dge ba rin po che'i rim
277b8(mdo): dang / dad pa'i rjes su 'bra ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa'i rin po che'i rigs dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i rin po che'i rigs
278a1(mdo): dang / lan cig phyir thob ba rin po che'i rigs dang / phyir myi 'ob ba rin po che'i rigs dang / dgra bcom pa'in po che'i rigs dang / rang sangs rgyas rin po che'i rigs dang / rin po che rigs dgul po 'dzi
278a2(mdo): dag las shi nang tu 'das nas/ bcu pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de byung ste/ de yongs su
278a3(mdo): sbyangs na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zild kyis nonod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud rnams la yang snang bar byed do// blo gros rgya mtsho' 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po de dgang
278a4(mdo): gi tshe sbyang ba bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/ phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur dang / nor bu rin po che de ni 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams la phan par byed par 'gyur ro// 
278a5(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho la de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che de yang gang gi tshe/ sbyang ba bzod cing gnod pa ban da la/ phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur da na/ thams cad mkhyend pa/ 
278a6(mdo): sems bskyed pa rin po che/ skyon thams cad dang bral ba de 'dis sems can thams cad la phan pa byed par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho yid la thams mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che sbyang ba gang zhen/ 
278a7(mdo): 'di lta ste/ sdom pa gsum gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub byams pa'i rjes su 'dug pas/ sems can thams cad la byams shing da ba dang / snying rje'i rjes su 'jug pas
278a8(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la brtsond pa dang / dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang / btang snyoms kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams can la myi 'ag
278b1(mdo): shing rtag tu sems drang ba dang / g.yo la dang spu byed pas phan pa'i dngos po 'i bsam par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bsam 'a thams cad rtsom pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang / cang shes kyi sems kyis dran pa dang / 
278b2(mdo): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / sems shin pa tu dul bas sems las su rung ba dang / dgang sla bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa dang / gso sla bas 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang
278b3(mdo): bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud cing rab tu gdug pa dang / nga rgyal myed pas khyengs pa ma dang / rtsod pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems nges par sems pas rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par song ba dang / rnyog pa
278b4(mdo): myed pas sems gsal ba dang / bdag la myi bstod pas bdag shes pa la 'jug pa dang / gzhan la myi smod pas sems can rjes su bsrung ba dang / sngon gi sems kyis chos la gus pa dang / de'i don
278b5(mdo): so sor myong bas chos don du gnyer ba dang de la gzhol 'bab bab pas chos 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa la gnas/ pas chos la dga' ba dang / chos ma yin pa rnam par bsod bas
278b6(mdo): chos yongs su tshos ba dang / rtag tu ngo tsha shes pas dkon mchog gsum la dod pa rgyun myi 'chad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smyind pa la yid ches pas/ myi dge ba thams cad yid la myi byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug
278b7(mdo): pa dang / drang bas spyod lam sbas pa dang / khyengs pa myed pas mnyen pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su tshol bas dgod pa dang / bral ba dang / blo brtan pas snyom las myed pa dang / rab tu myi g.yo bas sems ri
278b8(mdo): dang mtshungs pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / kho 'khro ba dang bral bas sems sa dpa mtshungs pa dang / bsam pa dag pas sems rgya dang mtshungs pa dang / rlom sems myed pas sems me dang mtshungs pa
279a1(mdo): dang / gnas myed pas sems rlung dang mtshungs pa dang / shi nad tu dri ma myed pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'khrugs pa myed pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba la gzhol ba dang / 
279a2(mdo): lus dben pa'i phyir dgon pa la dga' ba dang / sems dben pa'i phyir chos la sbyor ba dang / de byed cing yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang / kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa de
279a3(mdo): bzhin byed pa dang / nyon mongs pas myi rdzi ba'i phyir sems dpa' ba dang / shi nad tu mnyam pa myed pa'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab la yang 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims
279a4(mdo): lhod pa myed pa dang / skye bar smonod pa myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims skyon myed pa dang / gcig tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyir tshul khrims thun tshags ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bsre
279a5(mdo): nyen la ste nad pa dang / myig yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'od zer/ thogs pa myed pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgra la zhegs pa myed pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri la thogs pa myed
279a6(mdo): pa dang / mu yongs su dag pa'i phyir rol thogs pa myed pa dang / lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir reg la thogs pa myed pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos la thogs pa myed pa'o// blo gros rgya
279a7(mdo): mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni myi sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang bral ba'i yin/ byams pa shi nad tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ rten cing
279a8(mdo): 'brel par 'byung la la shi na tu brtags pa'i phyir/ gti mug gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ dbang po rnams la shind tu brtags pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/ stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir smrab
279b1(mdo): pa yang dag par bas sa dpa' yin/ 'byung bar bya ba'i khams yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas spang ba bas lang pa yin/ yang dag par bslab pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug dang
279b2(mdo): 'jigs pa dang / dargyal dang bral ba yin/ chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna byed ma yin/ ba 'ing gi sbyin pas kun 'dzind pa 'i sems myed pa yin/ theg pa dma' ba la 'dod pa byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa 'i
279b3(mdo): dbang po sbas pa'i phyir nang nye bar zhi ba yin/ rgya bo bzhi las bsgral pa'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par sbyar ba yin/ pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir stegs dpa'a' ba shin tu bcas pa yin/ 'apal gin tu
279b4(mdo): gnas pa'i phyir 'das dang 'babs las rgalang pa yin te/ ze gros rgya mtsho de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ kang gi / chos 'di lta bur de dag gis dag pa dang / yongs su das
279b5(mdo): pa dang / sbyin pa 'phags pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su// dag pa de ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po chede sbyong ba'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su la
279b6(mdo): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams shing // rnam par dag pa'i las lam bucu la slob// byams pas sems can kun la yang dag blta la// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend
279b7(mdo): pa'i sems sbyang yin// snying rje ldan pas gzhan gi bya bar brtson// dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor// btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba myed// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyi
279b8(mdo): sems spyong yin/ shes rab rtag tu drang zhing g.yo ni rnam par spangs// gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs// lhag bsam dge ba ji yin rjes su 'jug/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems
280a1(mdo): skyom yin// shes rab rab 'dug dran dang shes bzhin can// sems rab dul bas sems ni las su rung // sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dpa' so sra ba// 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i
280a2(mdo): sems skyo yin// 'phags rigs chog zhes pa dang tshig mnyen dang // bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed pa/ brtson 'grus nga rgyal sangs dang stobs ldan dang // brnyas pa log pa nam yang byed ma yin/ 
280a3(mdo): sems ni nges sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral// rnyog pa myed cing rtag tu dpal gsal// bdag shes pa la rim gis 'jug par byed// gzhan la myi brnyas sems can rjes su srung // chos la gus paral
280a4(mdo): dgal zhing gus dang bcas// bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni song bar byed// chos don gnyer zhing chos la rtonang par byed// rab tu chos don gzhol zhing 'bab par byed// chos la brtson zhing
280a5(mdo): nyon mongs myed pa bsgoms// chos myin sangs shing chos rnam sa yongs su tshol// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa myi byed// ldan// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems spyod yin// 
280a6(mdo): rtag tu mdzes dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo tsha sdom// khrel yod ldan zhing 'dir ni dbang po bsdams// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyod yin// rab tu sbya
280a7(mdo): bas las kyi bya ba 'jug/ bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis/ 'dzind myi byed// mkhas pa rtend pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems sbyong yin// spyod lam gyis
280a8(mdo): ni drang ba'i don dang ldan// khengs pa myed pas rtag tu banyen pa yin// zhi gnas mchog dang ldan pas rgod pa myed// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems spyo yin// blo ni rab tu brtan
280b1(mdo): pas nyams pa myed// lhag mthong la ni ri rgyal ji bzhin te/ dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs nyams pa myed/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyenang pa'i sems spyod yin// sdug bsngal bde bas myi 'a
280b2(mdo): ga yo las dang margyangs// bsam pa dag pas rgya ltar dri ma labru// rtag tu rlom sems myed pas me dang mtshungs// gnas mying dge bas rtag tu rung dnga'adra/ rtag tu drim myed par mkha' mnyam semasan/ 
280b3(mdo): rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas bstand pa rnyed// lus ni dben zhing zhi bas dgon par dga'// sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod// dge ba bden pa smra dang yang dag smra// ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin byed
280b4(mdo): nyon mongs kyi ji dge la dpa' bo mchog/ shinang tu bslabs pas bslab pa yang dag 'dzin // de la spyod pa nam yang yod ma yin/ kha na mtho chungs 'ang rtag tu 'jigs// byang chub mchog rgya'i tshu
280b5(mdo): khrims nyams pa myed// yon tan dgar myod tshul khrims 'dri// sa pa myed// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstend cing sdig pa myed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems sogs bya phyir brton// 
280b6(mdo): de ltar de'i myig ni dri myed kyis// 'jig rtend kun la 'od zer mnyam pa ltar// mkhas pa de ni sna tshogs sgra thos nas// dga' myed rangs pa myed cing zhum pa myed// blo ldan de ni sgra'i don rtogs shes
280b7(mdo): de ni na ba de ltar rnam par nyid// sna'is tri dang lce'i sa ro rnams dang // lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos rnams la// reg nas ma khyengs ma dul zhum pa myed// de ltar de'i dbang po dag pa nyid// chags pas kyi/ 
280b8(mdo): chags spang bas sngang 'byed// gti mug ma rmongs myi stug gnas pa can// byams la dga' zhing rkyend kyi chos sems pa// 'di ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems spyod yin/ sgrib pa lnga po dag gis
281a1(mdo): bsgribs pa myed// de ltar des ni dbang po lnga yang bsgoms// de ni kang du'ang sgrib byed bcings pa'ang myed// stobs rnams lnga po dag la rab tu gnas// kun nas lnga ba shes shing byung ba yin/ 
281a2(mdo): tshul bzhin ma yin pasangs shing tshul bzhin gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rtend// yang dag song dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan// byang chub yan lag bstend dang rtag tu ldan// brtand pa de ni yan lag brgyad
281a3(mdo): lam mchog/ de ni 'dod dang pa 'jigs myi 'gro'i// gti mug bral zhing dbang po shind tu bsdams// chos kyi sbyin pa de ni ser sna myed// slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab myi byed de// zang zing myed par chos ni
281a4(mdo): byon par byed// des na de'i byang chub sems dag 'gyur// de ni nang dazing rnams la kun 'dzin byed// rnam smin re byed 'dod srung rtong bar byed// sbyin dang snyan dang don byed don mthun pas/ de ni sems can
281a5(mdo): brgya dag rab tu snang // de'i byang chub sems ni brjed myi 'gyur/ zag pa dman lanam ya ra ba byed// ji lta ji ltar sangs rgya// sa yon tan mthong // de lta de ltar de bsam ri rab 'dra// nang
281a6(mdo): ni raba'i srid pa'i nyes pa mthong // de ni gzhan gi 'khrul pas kyi byed// 'dus byas nges pa dag kyang shinang tu mthong / 'khor bas 'a rdzogs pas sdig pa rnams myi byed// legs spyod khur khyer ba man
281a7(mdo): skye ba byed// zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod la nyams pa myed// chos rnams yongs su bzung bas zhum pa myed// sems can thar da byed rgyu la 'jigs pa myed// chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral ba'i phyir// de ni
281a8(mdo): chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed// lus can mya ngan 'das lam bzud pa'i phyir// de ni stegs dang zam pa 'chal bar byed// 'dam las rgal zhing 'bobs las rgal nas ni// zang la gnas shing de dag 'jim
281b1(mdo): byed gnas/ 'jigs pas dben gyi rnams la 'jigs myed stond/ bdag nyid zhal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol// gang dag chos rgyal 'di dag rnam dag cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan lam
281b2(mdo): sbyar// de dag byang chub sems dpal mchog rnam dag te/ nyon mongs dri mas gzhan yang gos myi 'gyur// ji ste nam mkha' nyon mongs bya bar nus// de la rjes kyang bstan par nus myi srid kyi// rang bzhin
281b3(mdo): 'od gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// de ni nam yang nyi mos byar myi nus// thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems rin po che yongs su sbyad pa'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// 
281b4(mdo): bam po gnyis so// / blo gros rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa ni ji lta bu// thams cad mkhyen
281b5(mdo): par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa ni gang zhe na/ blo gros// rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pothams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che de ltar sems
281b6(mdo): bskyed nas/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims 'chas pa'i sems can rnams sam/ bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ bdud kyis byin kyis brlabs pa rnams sam/ 
281b7(mdo): bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis gces sam/ rnam par gces sam/ bskyod dam/ kun tu bskyod dmang / dkrugs sam/ kun tu bkrugs sam/ bsdigs sam/ brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems
281b8(mdo): bskyed pa mas mi byed pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu tha dad par bya ba'i stong rje chen pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa las myi byed pa dang / dkon mcheg gsum gi rigs kyi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las
282a1(mdo): myi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas la sbyor bas myi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
282a2(mdo): sasogs pa las myi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrub par brtson pa las myi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs lus dang srog
282a3(mdo): 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par mngon par brtson par las myi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis dpyas kyang bzod/ 'thing skad byas pa dang / smod pa dang / bshong bar byas kyang bzod/ sems can
282a4(mdo): thams cad kyis skyed yongs su smyind par bya ba la mngon par brtson zhing / bdag bde ba las myi chags pa las myi phyed pa ste/ de de lhur lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyurd pas sems can
282a5(mdo): thams cad kyis dpyas kyang bzod// 'thing slad byas pa dang / smod/ pa dang / bshung bar byas kyang bzod/ sems can thams cad kyis myos sam ngan du brjod dam/ ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam yang
282a6(mdo): bzod/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa'ang bzod// sems can thams cad kyi khrur yang bzod/ sgrol bas kyang skyo ba myed/ zhum pa myed/ kun tu zhum pa myed/ sgyid lug pa myed/ yi chad pa myed kyi
282a7(mdo): stobs nye bar rtond pa myed/ mthu bskyed pas byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom la// rtuld pas/ rtul bar byed de/ spro ba bskyed cing rmongs pa'i sems myi 'dzind to// de spyos kyang slar myi gshel/ bdegs kyang
282a8(mdo): slar myi brdeg/ khros kyang slar myi 'gro/ 'khrugs kyang slar myi 'khrug ste/ de ltar sems bgrang ba'i go cha gyon to// 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa'i theg pan
282b1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni rgyund kyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go// bdag ni rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o// sems can de dag ni phan tshun myi mthun pa dag de'o// bdag ni sems can thams
282b2(mdo): cad kyi myi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa'o// sems can de dag ni gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go// bdag ni bzod pa dang nges pa yongs su tshol ba'o// sems can de dag ni cig la cig yongs su 'drid
282b3(mdo): par gnas pa dag go// bdag ni shes rab kyis dmas pa yongs su tshol ba'o// gal te sems can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu phye ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ral gyi dang / mu dang thung dang / 
282b4(mdo): mda'o che lag na thogs te/ bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang sa phyogs su 'greng dam 'dug gam 'chag gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i sems sam/ tshul
282b5(mdo): khrims kyi sems sam/ bzod pa'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/ bsam gtan gi sems sam/ shes rab kyi sems sam/ thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems
282b6(mdo): skye bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs dang bdag lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya tsam du brngubs sam/ rnam par gtord tam/ rnam par bcom 'am/ sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan myi byed par rgyu nang / 
282b7(mdo): tu gshe' ba 'am/ bsdigs sam/ spod dam/ bzhung ngan/ tshig ngan pa dang / ngag chub mos smra ba de ltar gyurd kyang / bdag gis sems can 'gal yang 'khrugs pa'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o// re
282b8(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gi yanga' nas 'khor ba cad myed par byas te/ gang du bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ngam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du song ngam/ myi sa
283a1(mdo): gyur kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i zas kyi dri mas dri ma can du gyur nas/ chos 'dod pa dang myi ldan zhing yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i khyod yul don byed pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te/ yan lag dang nying lag brkya / 
283a2(mdo): gshags shing / gdubs te bye zhing bral la bya ba rnam pa mang pos byas kyang / bdag gis gzhi de las bdag gi don byas kyi gzhan gi don sa byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha' bdag
283a3(mdo): ki lus gshegs btubs rnam par gtor/ rnam par bcom par de lta bur gyur kyang / bdag gis thams cad mkhyend pa yongs su myi gtong ngo // sems can thams cad yongs su myi garte rnga'o// dge ba'i
283a4(mdo): chos la 'dun pa yongs su myi gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus btubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di thams cad ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ba nas
283a5(mdo): rgyu'i bar d+ha yang myi bzod do// bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni spro'i dge la la ni bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa btang bar myi bya'o// sems can thams cad rab tu tha rad par
283a6(mdo): bya ba la dmyigs pa'i snying rje chen po mya gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te/ dge ba la ni bar chad mang ngo // myi dge ba'i phyogs la grogs byed pa ni mang ngo // dge ba'i
283a7(mdo): phyogs grogs byed pa ni nyung ngo // zhes gsungs pas/ bdag gis kyi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs kyi bya'i/ dge pa'i phyogs kyi grogs bya'o// sems can thams cad la bzod pa'i bya'i/ gnad sems
283a8(mdo): su kyi h+ya'o// sems can de dag sa gang ya pa byin yang bdag la gang yod pa dag gis sbyin par bya ste/ sems can de dag la gnod sems dang / khro ba dang / kha nang tu 'dzind pa yod pa de dag/ 
283b1(mdo): de rnams kyis byin yang bdag la bzod pa dang / nges pa gang yod pa bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i stobs brtan par bya'i/ gnod sems ni ma yin no snyam mo// blo gros rgya mtsho lus
283b2(mdo): dang srog 'dor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no// gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung ba'i chos de bdag gis
283b3(mdo): sang bar bya'o snyam mo// chos de gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus la dga' ba dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la chags pa ste/ lus btang nas gnod sems ga pa gtong ngo // blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bgrang
283b4(mdo): ga la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod de myi skyo myi 'khro'o// de gnod pa gsum bzod te/ gsum gang zhe na lus kyi gnod pa dang / 
283b5(mdo): ga gi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa'i bzod pa gang ne/ na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang chos nyid la rtond te/ 
283b6(mdo): gang de'i lus gcod pa'i sems can de nyid la blta'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
283b7(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ gang lus 'dor ba dang / gang lus yongs su gtong
283b8(mdo): ba dang / lus la myi lta ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang lus yongs su gcod pa na/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa dang / tshor ba rnams kyis myi 'phrogs pa
284a1(mdo): 'di ni/ de'i rgyal khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pam// gang lus yongs su gcod pa na/ gang dag de'i sus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu bdad par bya ba'i phyir bzod ci se sems kyis ma gyi phyi rten
284a2(mdo): bathod pa'i stobs nye ba rtond pa 'di ni/ de la 'azod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dun pa myi 'dod zhing sems kyi stobs bskyed pa yang rab tu 'dzin pas 'khor
284a3(mdo): pa nyid du 'tshams sbyor par dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa yang rtsom pa 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyin pa'o// gang sus rnam par 'dor ba na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po ched kyi 'arjed cingag/ 
284a4(mdo): byang chub nyid la blta pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba la so som rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// dgang sus gcod pa na/ lus la rtsa dang rtsig pa dang / shing dang rdo dang / 
284a5(mdo): myig yor lta bur so sor rtog cing lus la sgyur ma'i chos nyid du/ 'jug pa dang / yang dag par myi rtag pa nyid dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / yang dag par na bdag myed pa nyid dang / 
284a6(mdo): yang dag par na zhi ba nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha ro mod tu phyind pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug sgom pa
284a7(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las nyams par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa
284a8(mdo): gang zhe na/ gang ngan du brjod pa'i tshig thams cad dpu le nad pa dang / gshe ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / sdigs mo byed pa thams cad bzod pa dang / yod pa 'am myed pas glengs kyang
284b1(mdo): gyi khro ba dang / kho nad tu myi 'dzind pa dang / bag la nyal song ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan tu brjod pa dang / ngan tu smras pa'i tshig lam dang / 
284b2(mdo): gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol nas thos nas/ pha rold tu phyind pa drug sgom pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngan du brjod pa dang / 
284b3(mdo): ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol nas thos nas/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
284b4(mdo): dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan tu smras pa'i tshig gi lam dadang / gshe ba dang / bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos na/ dran pa 'di lta bu rab tu thob ste/ sems can 'di ni sngon nas ser sna can du gyur
284b5(mdo): pa 'jungs pa ste/ ser sna'i drims kun tu bskor ba des gang dag de'i gnod sems kyi dri ba 'asang ba'i phyir stond pa'i dge/ ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ma bsten dgus par ma byas/ bsnyen
284b6(mdo): bkur ma byas so// bdag ni gtong ba la mos shing ser sna myed par bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtend par bya/ bstend par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// snyam ste de dag bsrung zhing gnod sems kyang spong ba 'di
284b7(mdo): ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa las ma mthong ba ste/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims brtul la
284b8(mdo): zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las myi nyams par bya'o// gnod sems myed par bya'o// byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsrang bar bya'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa la brtan par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni
285a1(mdo): de'i rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni zhe sdang gi zham zhing / gnod sems mang ba ste/ den bdag lag she zhib bsdigs pam// ban
285a2(mdo): ni bzod pa'i stobs mdudu bya ste/ byams pa la gnas par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni le lo can/ dge ba'i chos
285a3(mdo): dang bral ba ste/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs so// bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal bar brtsond pa la ngoms par myi bya ste/ sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sngar
285a4(mdo): gi rjes su 'jug par byas la/ phyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du de ltar go cha byond pa 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
285a5(mdo): tu phyind pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni brjed ngas pa/ shes bzhin myed pa/ nyon mongs pa nges par ma bsams pa ste// de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa
285a6(mdo): bdag ni nyon mongs pa nges par bsam par bya/ dran pa dang shes bzhin can du bya/ rtse gcig tu byang chub kyi sems myi brjed par bya ste/ sems can ma dul ba ma zhi ba/ ma sas pa/ nye bar ma zhi ba/ 'dis
285a7(mdo): bu dag gi don du bdag gis go cha chen po bgos te/ 'di ltar sems nges par sems su 'jug go// snyam pa 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems
285a8(mdo): can 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa/ bdag tu smra ba/ sems can du lta bar dmyigs pa'i spyod yul ba ste/ 'di ni bdag la gshel zhing bsdigs pa'o// bdag gi chos nyid la brtend par bya'o snyam ste/ 'di
285b1(mdo): la gshe ba dang khro ba su yin zhes des yongs su tshol ba na/ gang gshe' ba dang khro ba'i chos de myi dmyigs shing / bdag dang gzhan myi dmyigs pas/ dmyiSh+Thas par lta ba dang / bral bar bzod pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi/ 
285b2(mdo): pha rold tu phyind pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i de ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i don du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / na pa dang / bsdigs pa dag pha rol da/ las thos na/ 
285b3(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / theg pa chen po de las kyang myi nyams te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpal
285b4(mdo): sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na// gang bdud thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems de las phral yang myi g.yo ba dang / bas kyi rgol ba dmyigs par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyis
285b5(mdo): yang dag par bsam par zhugs pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang myi brjed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'dug kyang myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i
285b6(mdo): sems de las nyams par byed myi nus te/ bdud rdzu 'phrul rab tu chen po dag gis khyod kyis theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par myi nus kyis/ khyod kyis gtses par bya ba 'di thong shig/ khyod kyis brtson la
285b7(mdo): 'grus 'di bor cig/ byang chub ni rnyed par dka' ba sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang du myong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde
285b8(mdo): ba yin gis/ skyes bu dam pa khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig/ ces de las sems skul zhing / sems dran par byed la glo gros rgya mtsho gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
286a1(mdo): chen po la de yar bral bar byed/ de sar thos pa zlog par byed kyang de sngon gyi chog myi 'dzis/ bsam pa rnam par 'arnags par myi byed kyi nga 'disam du sems te/ bdan ga ngas
286a2(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po mnan par bya/ bdag gis nges par bdud dpung dang bcas par pham par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ bdag gis nges par
286a3(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/ bdag gis nges par stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams su chos kyi gtam chen po brjod par bya/ bdag gis sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer la/ chos
286a4(mdo): kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad dang / bdag dang gzhan gi sems rig pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub tu bsam par rig gis/ bdag gis thams cad mkhyen
286a5(mdo): ba'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang / lha rnams dang / sems can thams cad dang bdag la slu bar myi bya'o// snyam pa de lta bu ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems
286a6(mdo): dpa' sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing theg pa chen po de las myi byed pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha
286a7(mdo): gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kong ba myed pa gang yin pa/ pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o// de nas
286a8(mdo): ramichimanam ldan 'das kyim tshigs su bcad pa 'brigasungs so// byang chugs ma las bamapas kyi byed cing // de ni snying rje mas kyang byed pa yin// madri gis dkon mchog gsum po 'asrung bar bya// sangs rgya
286b1(mdo): chos rnams yang dag bsgrub par bya// sum bcu rtsa gnyis khyad pags mtshan dang dpe byad bzang // gang dag gis ni stobs bcu rnams kyis lus mdzes pa// / de dag yongs su btsal phyir mchod sbyin bye ba byed// 
286b2(mdo): gnod pa shi nad tu rnam mang bzod cing yon tan phyug/ brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing rnams de dag bdag gis sbyang // rin cen chos marnyog de ni bdag gis bsrung byar bya// brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can de dag dgrol/ 
286b3(mdo): des na gnod pa bzod cing bsam pa myi byed do// phyogs bcu'i sems can khams ni mtha' yas ji snyed pa// thams cad 'dus par gyur nas lag na mtshon thogs te// de dag de la 'jigs sbyin gshe zhing bsdigs
286b4(mdo): byed kyang // yon tan phyir ni bsdigs pa 'phya ba spod par byed/ de sngon mtha'i bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas ji snyed par// de dag rgyun myi 'chad par tshig rtsub smras kyang ni// bdag nyid chen
286b5(mdo): po de bzod myi 'khro gshe ba myed// de ltar rtog pa rnams ni gnod pa dag par 'gyur// sems can de dag lag na mtshon thogs lhan cig tu// bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dum bu dum bur
286b6(mdo): gtubs// 'on kyang bdag gi sems yid nams yang khro bar myi bya ste/ byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par gyur // 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung // gang du byang chub sems dngog
286b7(mdo): 'di dang sbyin pa dang // dul ba'i sems dang gzhan yang dkar sems myi 'dor pa// der ni de lus dum bu dum bur rnam par 'thor// sems dmyal dud 'gro'i skye gnas yi dgas 'jig rtend myir// bskal pa
286b8(mdo): brgya phrag mtha' yas don myed lus kyang brngubs// sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par 'dod pas lus 'dor zhes// skyes bu de ni yid kyang yang dag tshim par byed// myi'i sdug bsngal rgyu ni rnam pa du ma dag/ 
287a1(mdo): mtshams myed sdug bsngal brgyar yang nye bar myi 'gro ba'o// dmyal ba rnams su bskal pa brgyar ni gnas par sro// rgyal ba dang ni chos dang sems can myi gtong ngo // bdag lus myi rtag rang du sgyu ma
287a2(mdo): 'dral// khams bzhi de dag gdug pa'i sbrul dpa'adra bar gsungs// bdag gi lus bor byas te/ drug myed 'gyur bar bya// nyon mongs dug zhi nas ni rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur// srid gsum 'jig rtend 'di na
287a3(mdo): lus bde 'gyur ba'i gzhi// 'dod pa'i zas rgya chung zad 'jigs pa ste// bdag gi lus btang 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur// bgrang ba 'di la gnod pa dang ni rkyen rnams bzod// nag po'i phyogs la grogs
287a4(mdo): ni brgyad stong phrag kyang mang // dkar po'i phyogs ni gang la 'ang/ grogs po gcig pur 'gyur// bdag ni myi dge rnams dang btsod par myi bya ste// sangs rgyas bzod pa gsung pa bdag gi grogs/ 
287a5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag 'dir ni bdag gi dbang / ji ltar sangs rgyas skul sems myi byed do// sangs rgyas dang / ni bdag nyid che lha bdag gi grogs// gnod pa bzod par bya'i snga
287a6(mdo): bar myi bya'o// gnod pa lus dang ngag yid rnam pa gsum du gsungs// gang bzod dpa' bo de ni myi phyed bzod pa yin// lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas yod pa dag/ gal te lus la bzod pa'i
287a7(mdo): lus gnod dag par 'gyur// lus ni dum bu dum bur gdubs te rnam 'thor tshe// thabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid pha rold phyind rdzogs 'gyur// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan
287a8(mdo): dang / shes rab khyad 'phags dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzind // lus dang sems la sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyang 'dor// sbyin bdag rab tu ldan par gyur ra pa'i byang chub sems// byams
287b1(mdo): pas 'jig rtend khyab byed tshul khrims nyams myi 'gyur// byang chub rjes su 'gro bas tshul khrims dag par 'dzind// bzod pa'i stobs bskyed yan lag rnams dang nying lag gcod// de yang de'i bzod pa pha rol
287b2(mdo): byi nad la sbyar// brtson 'grus gces pa la zhum par skabs sgyid lug byed// lus ni rnam par 'thor zhing brtson 'grus pa ro yang 'gro// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa dran pa myi 'dor zhing // nyon mongs mun pa
287b3(mdo): rdul bral rnam bsal phyir rab tu brtsond// lus bzhig nas ni bsam gtan stobs dang / na bar thob// 'di yang rdul bral bsam gtan pha rol phyind la sbyor// bdag gi lus ni bdag byed rmyi lam glog dang
287b4(mdo): 'dral// 'di la byed pa po myed tshor ba po yang myed// lus kyi ba tsing pas bcings pa'i sems can bdag gis dgrol// shes rarje ba 'od ni khyad 'phags pha rolang phyind pa mchog/ gang zhig 'di la
287b5(mdo): sbyor zhing tshul bzhin chos sems la// lus kyi gnod pa bzo// da cing rab sdang myi byed de// myi snyan pa dang smad dang bshung ba'i tshig thos kyang // de ni zhe sdang myi 'gyur byams ldan sems kyang dul
287b6(mdo): tha ba rab tu zhe sdang myi byed 'di ni sbyin pa dag/ byams pa nyid du 'gyu ra ba 'di ni tshul khrims dag/ bzod pa'i sems bskyed 'di ni bzod pa dag pa yin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod rnams brtson 'grus phyir zhing / 
287b7(mdo): bskyed// sems dang yid rab zhi pa 'di ni bsam gtan dag/ sgra skad myi rnyed 'di ni shes rab dag pa yin// myi'i tshig thos nas ni gang chos 'di sems pa// de 'dir gnod bzod dag gi skyon la chags pa myed// 
287b8(mdo): bdud dang mu stegs can gi lta gyur da brgya stong gis// gnas 'di rnyed dka' spyod pa 'os pa 'od brjod kyang // myi skrag zhum par myed cing phyi phyir mthu bskyed de// mkhas pa de ni gnod dang sems gnod mtha' yas// 
288a1(mdo): bzod// gang zhig bzod dang brtson 'grus rab gnas ri rab 'dra// sems can kun na'ang dpa'o de 'dir gnod pa bzod// stobs bcu rnams kyi spyang pa dang ni gnod shes nas// byang chub
288a2(mdo): rjes su 'gro bas phyi nas lung stond to// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sems bskyed pa rin po che 'bigs pa lhan gis grub pa gang zhe na// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems la
288a3(mdo): dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pas rin po che des rlom sems su myi byed de/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems bskyed pa de la brtend par myi byed/ gnas par myi byed/ le nad par myi byed de/ 
288a4(mdo): 'dor par myi byed de/ spros par myi byed/ rtog par myi byed de/ rnam par rtog par myi byed kyi/ rnam par rtog par zhi ba la gnas pa yin te/ de chos zab mo rnams la blos rnam par 'byed do// chos
288a5(mdo): zab mo de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtend cing 'brel para'/ byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / rgyu la dmyigs pa khongs su/ chud pa dang / rtag pa ma yin pa dang / chad pa ma yin pa dang / mtha
288a6(mdo): lta ba dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag myed pa dang / bdag ngo bo nyid myed pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa dang // gdod ma nos ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan
288a7(mdo): ma myed pa la yid ches pa dang / smonod pa myed pa la som nyi myed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang / shind tu myi rtag pa nyid dang / gzugs lbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / 
288a8(mdo): tsher ba rgya bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang / 'du shes smyig rgyu dpa' batshungs te/ gnyis su myed pa nyid dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyin
288b1(mdo): dang / khams rnams gsol ba byed pa nyid dang / skye mched rnams pas rgyam du shes pabyed pa nyid dang / sems gnas pa skyed pa dang / dmyal yings myi byed pa dang / sdug par byed pa lhag par myi byed pa dang / mnya
288b2(mdo): pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / tha dad du bya ba myed pa dang / ro gcig pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam gi tshogs shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang / nges pa'i don kyi don la rtonod pa dang / 
288b3(mdo): don kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i gro dang / skad thams cad la skad myed par 'dug pa dang / sgra thams cad la sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa shes pa dang / don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su byed pa la 'dug pa
288b4(mdo): shes pas/ don brjod du myed par rtogs pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang 'dzind pa myed pa/ kun 'byung ba shes pa shi nang tu zad pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa myed pa dang / lam shes pa
288b5(mdo): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' 'pho' ba myed pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang / 'jig
288b6(mdo): par myi gnas pa dang / sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa dmyigs pa la shi nad tu brtags pa dang / chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa chos kyi dbyings dbyings ma yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mnyam pas mnyam pa dang / rtsul
288b7(mdo): 'phrul gi rkang pa dbang sgyur bar gyurd pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shi nad tu 'das pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pas nges par byung ba dang / dran pa'i dbang po dran pa myed pa dang / 
288b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyi dbapa ze yid la byed pa byed pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po sros pa las shi nang tu 'das pa dang / dad pa'i stobs gzhan go drid myi 'jog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmyigs pa rtogs pa byed/ 
289a1(mdo): pa dang / dran pa'i stobs nyams pa myed pa dang ldan pa dang // ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs sems nges par sems par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs myi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / dran pa yang
289a2(mdo): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa myed cing brjed pa myed pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag le nad pa myed cing 'dor ba myed
289a3(mdo): ba dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dpal rlabs myed pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus dang sems la zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid
289a4(mdo): khong du chud pa dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba thams cad song ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su
289a5(mdo): rtog pa thams dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i ngag sgra skad thams cad// mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' lus dang sems kyi las dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho
289a6(mdo): ba tshol ba thams cad rgyu nad bcad pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba 'dag pa myed cing 'jog pa myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dge ba dang / myi dge ba'i rnam par rig pa myi 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
289a7(mdo): sems kyi dmyigs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / zhi ba zhi gnas kyi mthong ba sod pa dang / lhag mthong lta bas rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba myed pa'i don myi rtog pa'i don dang / gdod ma nas skye ba myed pa'i
289a8(mdo): don/ sdug bsngal gyi don dang // rgyu ba myed pa'i don bdag myed pa'i don dang / nye ba ma'i ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang / dul bas sbyin pa dang bsil ba'i dngos por gyurd pa'i tshul khrims dang / zad pa'i chos dang / 
289b1(mdo): ldan pa'i bzod pa dang / shinang tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nang nye bar zhi ba'i bsam gtan dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dang / sems can
289b2(mdo): gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i byams pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i snying rje dang / dga' ba myed pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsom pa thams cad rgyun chad pa'i btang snyoms dang / chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su
289b3(mdo): dag pa dang / sngon gi mtha' nas stong pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba na bdag myed pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun chad pa/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
289b4(mdo): 'di lta bu dag rtogs pa dang / khong du chud pa dang / 'jug pa shes padel spyod pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / nan tan byed pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
289b5(mdo): par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i 'bigs pa'o// de ltar thams cad mkhyend par sems bskyed pa rin po che de phigs na// chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i nyid lhan gyis grub pa nyid
289b6(mdo): 'jog par 'gyur ro// zo gros rgya mtshol 'di sa ste dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i gzhal byed khang lhun gis grul par rnam par rgyu zhing 'jam bu'i gling thams cad du snang bar byed kyang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba 'di snyam cu
289b7(mdo): bdag cag 'gra'am/ 'on te ldog sum du myos pas par/ sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyin pas de dag 'grol// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du rab tu 'bigs pa'i shes pa dang
289b8(mdo): ldan pa'i bya ngachub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po yang spun gis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed pa dag la sems can gyi don byed kyang byang chub sems dpal de ni yang mngon par 'du byed pa byed par bya ba de
290a1(mdo): ngag kun tu na to// thegs rgya mtsho la de la byang chub sems dpal 'bigs pa shes pa ga di ni bsam gtan gi pha yang tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pharoms tu phyin pa yongs su rjo
290a2(mdo): btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag na/ lhag mthong gis chos thams mthong gi/ mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni ma yin no// de lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni
290a3(mdo): shes rab ste/ shes rab des mngon sum du gyum mo/ gdutu mngon sum du 'gyur zhes/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon pas sum cu 'gyur ro// ma rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni
290a4(mdo): zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi gzhi de la kun myi spyod pa'o// chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par rig pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'o// rnam par rig pa de'i
290a5(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ de ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// gang gi tshe tshor ba thams cad rgyan bcad par gyurard pa de'i tshe/ snang ba
290a6(mdo): myi byed myi snang bar yang myi byed do// de la snang ba ni gapa/ myi snang ba ni gang zhe na/ snang ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o// myi snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'gag pa'o// gang gi tshe snang bar yang myi byed myi snang bar/ 
290a7(mdo): yang myi byed pa de'i tshe/ skye bar yang mye byed 'gag par yang myi byed do// gang gi tshe skye bar yang myi byed 'gag par yang myi byed pa de'i tshe chos nyid la gnas pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings la 'khrugs par myi byed/ 
290a8(mdo): de bzhin nyid las myi g.yo// yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig par myi byed do// de la chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni/ rtend cing 'brelang par 'byung rjes su rtogs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ni de kho na yi mtshan nyid khong du chud
290b1(mdo): pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su myed pa'i yang dag pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de skar mngon sum du shes pa rig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shi nang tu 'bigs pa shes pa
290b2(mdo): zhes bya'o// sbyang ba dang gnod pa dang / nges par 'byigs pa'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ lha dang myo'i skye dgu yi srog chags khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis bla na myed pa yang dag dror rdzogs pa'i
290b3(mdo): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags khri drug stong gis bzod pa rab tu thob par gyu rad to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos kun nges par rtogs pa'i/ byang
290b4(mdo): chub sems nga ni sgrogs par byed// de tshe nges rtogs ye shes kyis// chos rnams kun gyis chags pa myed// zab mo'i chos rnams khong du chud// mkhas pa skrag par 'gyur ba myed/ skrag
290b5(mdo): myed kun tu 'jigs myed pas/ khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ rgya la dmyigs para'i tshul gis ni// rtend pa'i chos rnams ma ngadu chung // shes rab ldan de rjes mthun byed// mtharas
290b6(mdo): ba ni myi 'dzin to// rtag pa dang ni chad pa la/ blo ni thogs pa yod ma yin// yang dag mtha' ni bsam yas pa'i// dbu ma'i mtha 'di rtogs par 'gyur/ bdag gis mtha'i rang bzhin gis/ chos rnams dang / 
290b7(mdo): myed ngo bo nyid// chos kun de'i rang bzhin te// gdod nas ma skyes 'gag pa myed// skyes pa myed cing byung ba myong // stong pa bzung myed rje ma myed// mtshan ma myed cing spros pa myed// nam mkha' dang ni mtshus
290b8(mdo): shing 'dra// de dag sems kyi myi smod par// 'dod cing chags pa rnam par sangs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin mngon sum du// lbu pa lta bur rab tu shes// tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba ste// 'du shes smyig rgyu
291a1(mdo): mtshan nyid do// 'du byed rgyu zhing ste seng po ladra// rnam par shes pasku ma 'dra// mkhas zhing zhamal bsrid pa ste// nam mala' mtshungs pa'i 'amam yin do// gang dag bye mched na mA mad/ 
291a2(mdo): bem pa po phan tshun spyod yul lo// sems ni nang ni ma yin te// phyi rol tu yang myi dmyigs so// yid la nga'i yod ma yin// rnam par shes pa gnas pa myed// chos rnams yid la myi byed de// lhag par byed pa
291a3(mdo): rnam par song // chos rnams thams cad mnyam nyid du// yang dag nyid du kho du du chud// tha dad myed cing ro gcig ste/ gcig pu bgrod lam mnyam pa nyid// lam gi shes pa rab tu rtogs// nges pa'i don gyi chos rnaMs
291a4(mdo): mthong // blo na don kyi rjes su zhugs// skad ni skad myed khong du chud // sgra rnams kun tu sngon mtha' dang // phyi ma'i mthar mar yongs su gtso dra// don dang tshig 'bru rnams la mkhas// chos rnams la
291a5(mdo): gnyis su myed par rtogs// brjod du myed pa'i don la ni// de nyid / yang dag khong du chud// skye ba myed par sdug bsngal zhes// kun 'byung ba la mnyam pa'i blo// 'gog pa shes pa zad par bstan
291a6(mdo): lam shes pa ni 'dus ma byas// lus dang tshor ba sems dang ni// chos la chos su rjes su rtogs// dran myed yid la byed myed pa'i// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston du// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyings myin par// 
291a7(mdo): yang dag nyid ni mnyam pas mnyam// spong bas spang du myed pa ni// yang dag song pa rab tu bas nang // sems la dbang ni thob pa'i// rdzu 'phrul gang pa rab tub stan / chags pa kun sa rab gnas pa/ 
291a8(mdo): de ni dad pa 'i dbang po yin// chos rnams thams cad rnam dben pa// de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin// dran pa myed pa'i dran 'jug pa// de ni dran pa'i dbang ma yin// chos rnams yid la myi byed pa// de ni/ 
291b1(mdo): ting 'dzind dbang po yin// spros las shi nad tu rab 'das pa// de ni shes rab dbang po yin// yang dag nyid du rtogs nas de// gzhan gi dad pas 'gro ba yin// sems ni g.yo' ba yod myin la// dad pa'i
291b2(mdo): stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// yang dag shes las nyams pa myed// dran pa'i stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs mdzod ni// nges par sems la dga' ba yin// myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa// shes rab
291b3(mdo): stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// chos rnams rtogs pa'i don du ni// byang chub yan rab tu bstand// mnyam ste myi mnyam myed pa'i chos// yang dag lta ba yin zhes brjod// gnyis myed chos la sgom pa ni// skye ba myed
291b4(mdo): pa'i lam bsgom yin// skye ba myed pa myi rtag don// 'byung bde myed pa sdug bsngal don// rgyu ba myed pa bdag myed don// ni don nye bar zhi ba'i gnas// dul ba'i sems ni sbyin pa yin
291b5(mdo): zhi ba'i sems ni tshul khrims ldan// zad pa'i chos rtogs bzod pa yin// brtson 'grus rnam par bye bar rtogs// shin tu zhi ba bsam gtan te// shes rab yang dag rab shes pa/ 
291b6(mdo): sems can gdod nas rnam dag don// byams pa zhes ni brjod pa yin// snying rje nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// dkal ba skyong ba dga' ba yin// rtsom pa thams cad rgyu nang chad pa// btang snyoms zhes ni rab tu bstan
291b7(mdo): 'khor gsum yongs su chad par ni// chos rnams thams cad rab tu shes// chos rnams nges par 'bigs 'di ni// lta ba'i mdud pa gcod pa yin// bsam gtan shes rab gang yin pa// deng ni nges par la
291b8(mdo): 'bigs pa bstand// tshad myed pa sa 'jug pa ni// chos shes pa zhes brjod pa yin// / gnod pa bzod pa dang / nges par 'bigs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'dra
292a1(mdo): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshol la bka' sa la pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho la de ltar na gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa dang / yongs su dag
292a2(mdo): par 'gyur te// bsam pa bcos pa ma yin zhing / sems can thams cad gis gnod par byas kya bzhi 'dras pa myed la/ shinang tu nges par zigs pa'i ye shes su gyur da cing / shes rab rnam par gdon phyi ma par
292a3(mdo): thob pa de'i tshe/ shi nad tu dkar ba'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rtsa ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de la ting nge 'dzind kyi rtsa ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de la ting nge 'dzin 'dir
292a4(mdo): rtsa ba'i gnas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la zhe sdang myed pa'i snying rje chen po'o// de sems can thams cad kyi sa bsti stang du byas kyang / khengs par myi 'gyur/ sos
292a5(mdo): can thams cad kyis bsti bstang ma byas kya ba 'dud par myi 'gyur ro// khengs pa myed pa dang 'dud pa myed pa de ni/ shes pa las des par 'byung ba yin gi/ nga rgyal las nges par byung ba ma yin no// 
292a6(mdo): khengs pa myed pa dang 'dud pa myed pa de ni chos dang ldan pa yin gi/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin no// chos thams cad shes pa las nges par byung bas/ ye shes yongs su 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ 
292a7(mdo): ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ de lus sam dag ka ma yid kyi las gang byed kyang / de thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes
292a8(mdo): kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi las ye shes kyi sngon tu 'gro ba gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstand pas/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par byed/ 'dul bar byed do// 
292b1(mdo): spyod lam ji lta bur sems can rnams dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu nyid du de'i spyod lam lhun gis grub cing yongs su brtags pa myed par kun tu gnas so// lus kyi skyon dang lus la chags pa dang / lus kyi 'gyur ba dang / 
292b2(mdo): lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang / lus kyi 'khrugs pa dang / lus kyi yongs su rtog pa gang yin pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' des yang dag par bcom pa yin te/ shing ta la'i 'go bcad pa bzhin du rtsa ba nas chad nas ma 'a
292b3(mdo): 'ongs pa na/ myi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de la lus yongs su dag pa yin te/ lus legs par mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang / lag pa dang rkang pa 'jam zhing mnyan pa dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun
292b4(mdo): pa'i lus shi nang tu rnam par bye ba dang / dbang po ma tsha ba byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang / gzugs kyis rgyags shing dregs pa myed pa yin te/ lus #
292b5(mdo): ba'i tshul dang ldan pa ma yin no// de chos 'dzind pa nye bar bzung nas sems can ji tsam du dman pa/ gzugs ma chang ba rnams la yang 'dung // rab tu 'dung ngo // de rang gi lus kyi chos la
292b6(mdo): nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos mnyam pa nyid du shes pa la 'dug go// de lus la lus kyi chos nyid shes nas/ chos kyi lum yid gi zang zing gi sus ma yin no// de la chos kyi lus
292b7(mdo): nyid gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gi zas za ba yin gyi/ zang zig zas za ba ma yin te/ 'jig rtend dang mthum par bya ba dang / sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir zas za ba'i lus nyam chung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// 
292b8(mdo): de chos kyi lus su gyu ra nas/ chos kyis srog 'tsho zhing / zang zing gis srog 'tsho ba ni ma yin no// de la chos kyi srog 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ gang zlog gi phyir yang bya ba ma yin pa myi byed pa dang / 'phags pa
293a1(mdo): rgyal mas kyi 'dal ba'o// de la 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa myed pa dang / sdang ba myed pa dang / rmongs pa myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral
293a2(mdo): pa dang / ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa de bzhin du kun tu bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / rab tu gnas pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang ldan
293a3(mdo): bal mngon pa shes pa dang / chu 'phrul gi stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/ de sun gis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu snang bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sems can de dag gi gzugs dang / 
293a4(mdo): mtshan ma dang / gzi' brjid dang / rgyan rnams ji 'dra bar byang chu de sems dpa' de'i yang ldan gis grub cing yongs su brtags par de dang 'dra bar gnas so// de 'od bkod pa'i lus dang ldan pa
293a5(mdo): yin te/ de gang gi tshe lus 'od rab tu gtong ba de'i tshe/ sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed dpag tu myed pa rnams snang bas khyab par byed do// de'i 'od de ni bde ba skyed pa ste/ sems can
293a6(mdo): dmyal ba ba ngan song ba'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'o// de'i 'od de ni bde ba la reg par byed pa ste/ nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// de'i 'od de ni
293a7(mdo): rab tu sim par byed pa ste/ sems can rnams kyi lus dang sems dga' ba skye ba'o// de lus nyid kyi sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi las ye shes
293a8(mdo): rjod tu masa'o// thags byamapa 'das byang chub sem la dpa'i ngag gis gas ldan tu rje 'gang da/ thabras kyi tshod ma ma rnas pa 'gyung ma
293b1(mdo): ngag gi las 'byung ngo // blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshig 'khrul pa'i skyon de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i' byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig 'khrul pa'i skyon drug cu rtsa bzhi dang bral zhing / rnam par spangs pa'i ngag gi
293b2(mdo): las 'byung ste/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpal ni tshig rtsub po myed pa yin/ tshig rnyog pa myed pa yin/ gyo mo'i sgra lta bu myed pa yin/ grum pa'i sgra lta bu myed pa
293b3(mdo): yin/ sgra ha cang che ba ma yin/ s+tha ha cang chung ba ma yin/ s+tha ha cang drag po ma yin/ tshig pa rlang po myed pa yin/ tshig dpe dab po myed pa yin/ tshig cas cal po myed pa yin/ tshig rtab rtab po myed pa yin/ 
293b4(mdo): khas bub pa'i tshig lta bu myed pa yin/ tshig nyams pa myed pa yin/ zur dbyung dgos pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ tshig zhum pa myed pa dan/ tshig sub sub po myed pa yin/ byis pa'i tshig lta bu myed pa yin/ 
293b5(mdo): tshig nag nog po myed pa yin/ 'bar bar byed pa'i tshig myed pa 'i na co 'dri ba'i tshig byed pa yin/ dus myi zhes pa'i tshig byed pa yin/ tshong gyi zhes pa'i tshig byed zer pa yin/ 'dod chags kyis
293b6(mdo): rjes su chags pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ zhe sdang gis ni 'dres pa'i cho ga byed pa yin/ gti mug gis rmongs shing lkugs pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ dman pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ myi mthun pa dang bcas pa'i tshig
293b7(mdo): myed pa yin/ 'byed par byed pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ g.yo dang 'dres pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ nga rgyal gyis 'das pa'i tshig byed pa yin/ khyang du gsod pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ ngos ring gi tshig byed pa yin/ 
293b8(mdo): tshig kyi snyand cing zher 'debs pa myed pa'i yin/ myed pas phreng ba'i tshig byed pa yin/ 'khruld cing gshe ba'i tshig myed pa yin/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig byed pa yin/ 'bral du 'ardzun smra ba'i tshig
294a1(mdo): kya na/ ga tum ma 'ag kya / 'du gyun pa rgyang nam rgyas byed
294a2(mdo): ha cang mnyen pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ phal ba'i tshig myed pa yin/ kun tu ma bsrungs pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ dus las lhag pa'i smras pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ gnod da sems 'bar ba'i tshig myed pa yin/ 
294a3(mdo): 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dpa'agyed pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ thob kyis 'jal po'i tshig myed pa yin/ tshig 'gyur ba myed pa yin/ tshig myi ba rtan pa myed pa yin/ mu tshor smra ba'i tshig myed pa yin/ kar ma
294a4(mdo): lhad mo pa'i tshig lta bu myed pa yin/ chos dang 'gal ba'i tshig rgya da pa yin/ gsangapa 'phel ba'o tshig myed pa yin/ sems/ can la gnod pa'i sems myed pa yin/ bdag la spyod pa'i tshig
294a5(mdo): myed pa yin/ gzhan la spyod pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ 'phya ba dang / bstong pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang 'gal pa'i tshig myed pa yin/ 'phags pa la sku dad pa 'debs
294a6(mdo): pa'i tshis byed pa yin/ dbyi chang ba'i tshig byed pa san/ ga 'dzus pa'i na thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig nyid de/ tshig drug bcu rtsa 'o no min te/ so gros rgyam tsho'i byang chub sems dpa'i nags pa'i
294a7(mdo): tshig 'khrul pa'i spyan drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'byung ngo // de'i ngag de ni byeng par lung stond pa dang / yang dag par lung sde nad pa dang / de kho na lung stond pa dang / bden pa rnam
294a8(mdo): par dgod pa lung ston pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'dug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa lung bu nang pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par byed
294b1(mdo): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po skul bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gis brlabs pa dang / chos dang myi 'gal ba dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun
294b2(mdo): ba shi na tu rnam par phye ba dang / zla ba ltar dri ma myed cing snyand pa dang / 'dod chags kun tu bskyed pa ma yin pa dang / tshar bcad nas yon tan smra ba dang / zhe sdang myi bskyed pa dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / 
294b3(mdo): gti mug kun tu myi skyed pa dang / phyogs bcur go bar byed cing rgyas par 'gyings dang / tshig don myed pa ma yin pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'byung ste/ 
294b4(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho la 'od ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi las ye shesasngon tu 'gro ba'o// blo gros rgya mtshol de la byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi las/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ bre gros rgya mtsho 'di la
294b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi 'jug pa ga ga gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang gam ma/ pa rnams rab tu shes so// mnyam par gzhag kyang spyod lam thos
294b6(mdo): cad ku nad tu stond cing / ting nge 'dzind de las ldang ba yang myed do// de'i sems kyi las ni bdud thams cad kyis kyang myi shes so// de'i sems kyi 'jug pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
294b7(mdo): kyang myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag la konang par bya ba dang / gzhan la gnod pa bya ba dang / gnyi ga la gnod pa bya ba myi sems so// de'i sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa ni chos gapal yang
294b8(mdo): thogs pa myed do// de chos thams cad rig par ye shes mthong ba skyed ro// sems dang yod dang rnam par shes pa des rig pa myed par tshor ba yang so sor myob la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su ma
295a1(mdo): rdzogs kyi bar tu tshor pa 'gog pa mngon sum du yang myi byed de/ blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di ni shi nang tu dkar
295a2(mdo): ba tri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind de'i rtsa ba'i gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba'i ngag gi las dang / ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so// 
295a3(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho la gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams dang / ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe/ shi nang tu dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag
295a4(mdo): rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu 'thob bo// bre gros rgya mtsho de la chos bcu shind tu dkar ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di shi nang tu dkar bdenan bya ste/ chos bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa
295a5(mdo): dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'dug pa'i spyod pazhin/ tu dkar ba yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su dgas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa zhinang tu dkar ma yin/ 
295a6(mdo): dge ba chos thams cad yongs su dag pas/ dkar ba'i rnam pa'i mthong ba'i spyod lam shin turnam par dag pa yin/ brtan pa byed pa'i mtshang myi byed pa yongs su dag 'as/ mchad dang pal byang
295a7(mdo): ngas su gas par byed pa'i byed bzhin kya da/ sa mas pa nan mngon pa byung pa pa mi sangs su sus ma ma pa'i bya
295a8(mdo): bzhin tu dag ma 'an/ 'phrus pa dang / sgrib pa dang / cad pa dang ldan nas snang ba thams cad dang / bral ba yongs su dag 'as/ dran pa dang ti nga 'dzin dang / nas ma byung ma nas bag
295b1(mdo): phan ma ma sangs su dran pas byang chub tu phyags kyim mags pa kun tu dgar bsan/ thams dang yi dngarnam pa gas pa yongs su dag 'am/ ni gnas dang / sdug ma ma shes pa yinas
295b2(mdo): dgang ba yin/ phyogs dang phyisathun pa'i phyogs dang / rgyan chang ba dang / chags pa las zhinapa tu 'das pa yongs su dag pas sa bcu gnon pa'i legs shi nang tu dkar ba yin/ myi dge ba ma cham thams cad
295b3(mdo): ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyad kyi po zhes shi nang tu dkar ba yin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho la chos bcu po de dag shi nad tu dkar ba 'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin pa 'ang
295b4(mdo): shi nad tu dkar ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa blo gas/ rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po gsum pa'o// // blo gros rgya mamal ci'i phyir rdzi ma myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya zhe na/ 
295b5(mdo): blo gros rgya mthom nyi shu pa 'di dag ni/ dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo yin tong/ de dag gis na ting nge 'dzin 'di dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya nas bya'o// nyi shu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngang 'dzin pa
295b6(mdo): yongs su dag pas/ nang yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / pa'i 'dzind pa/ yongs su dag pas phyi yongs su dag pa rdzi ma myong ba'i phyag rgya dang / lta ba song ba thams cad yongs su dag pas/ 
295b7(mdo): 'jig tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdod ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir sems can thams cad bdag myed pa yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / ro gcig
295b8(mdo): pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par tha dad pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smanod pa myed pa yongs
296a1(mdo): su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / tha dad du bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su ngas
296a2(mdo): pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / rang gi mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mngon gsum du legs par mthong ba yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / rtag tu snang ba'i yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ nyi ma'i dkyil
296a3(mdo): 'khor ltar rab tu gsal ba yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / chags pa thams cad dang bral ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ dus gsum la chags pa myed pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag
296a4(mdo): rgya dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ye shes gnas pa myed pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas yongs
296a5(mdo): su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / rkyen shi nang tu brtags pa'i phyir rtend cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs pa yongs su dag pa'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / yang dag par shes pa'i rdzi ba myed pa yongs
296a6(mdo): su dag pa'i phyir/ stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngon yongs su sbyong ba byas pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
296a7(mdo): rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba'i phyir/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / mtha'
296a8(mdo): thams cad dang bral ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi la
296b1(mdo): 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya dang / yang dag par blangs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs
296b2(mdo): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo rtogs pa yongs su dag pa'i dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu po de dag gis ting nge 'dzind dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho' bya ba'
296b3(mdo): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ ting nge 'dzind gang rab tu thob pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di ni shi nad tu dkar pa dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// ting nge 'dzind 'di thob ma thag tu shugs chen po ma 'dres
296b4(mdo): pa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rdo rjer gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni shugs chen po ma 'dres pa dang po'o// 
296b5(mdo): shing ljon pa thams cad la lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs// chags te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba de logs su 'dud cing / 'dud la rab tu 'dud te/ mngon par rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ba dang / 
296b6(mdo): sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod par myi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song ba'i sems can thams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub pa'i byang chub sems dpal mthong ste/ 
296b7(mdo): mthong nas kyang bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad du yang / bar gyi 'jig rtend rnams gser gi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis khyab par 'gyur ba dang / sa g.yo ba chen po 'jig
296b8(mdo): rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / sems can gang la 'ang rnam par gnod par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal stond cing myi 'jigs pas dbugs 'byind par
297a1(mdo): mdzad de/ ded dpon chen por rgyal bar gyur da cig/ rgyal bar gyurd cig ces gsung brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la chub par 'gyur ba / 
297a2(mdo): bla gros rgya mtshol shi nad tu dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind thob ma thag tu shugs chen po ma 'dres pa brgyad po de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind 'di'i mthus 'dir yon tan gi rgyud dpag
297a3(mdo): tu myed par yang kun tu snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung ngo // chos 'di dri myed dag dge' rang bzhin 'od gsal te/ nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam la gdod nas
297a4(mdo): byung ba myed/ ma skyes ma byung gnas pa myed cing 'gags pa myed/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dri med g.yo ba myed// de'i rtsa ba pa'i gnas ni dbye ba myed pa'i gzungs// byams pa dang ni snying rje sgom
297a5(mdo): pa zung du 'brelang// des na 'gro ba kun gyis bkur kyang dgal/ ba byed/ bsti bstang ma byas mi 'chad byed de mnyam pa byed de/ 'i blo/ de ni mnyam pa'i chos las ye shes skyes gyur nas
297a6(mdo): gti mug mun pa thams cadabacom ste rmongs pa myed// ye shes ldan pa yin ki nga rgyal ldan pa yin// nges bsams mnyam chos shes nas/ de shi nad tu rnam par dag/ mkhas pa lus ngag yid kyis las ni gang
297a7(mdo): byed pa// thams cad shes pas byas te 'gro la bde ba byed// de lus rnam par dag pas sems can mang pos mthong // rgyal po'i ye shes rdul myed bla na myed la son// de'i spyod lam rtag tu bsdams te 'khrul
297a8(mdo): pa byed// lhun gyis grub ste ba mar myi rtog rnam rtog byed// lus kyi nyes pa mtha' yas ji tsam gang brjod pa// de dag de la chad de gdod nas skyes pa byed// de lus mtshan gis brgyan te shi nang tu rnam par
297b1(mdo): bye/ de'i na pa dis yang sa ning bsod nams rnams las byung // dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sum mangs kyang / mkhas pa gzugs kyi rgyags pas rnam sems byed pa byed/ dmang ring
297b2(mdo): dbul bas sdug bsngal sems can mang po gang // de dag la yang gus bcas 'dud cing rab tu 'dud// bdag ni chos 'dzind gyur da cig snyam ste nga rgyal myed// chos mnyan des ni byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur// 
297b3(mdo): de'is rang gi lus kyi cho sa nyid shes nas ni// de'is sems can kun lus de ltar rtogs pas na// de ni chos sus rdul dang bral ba 'phem 'gyur te// zang zing lus myin nyon mongs rnams las shi nad tu grol// rtag tu
297b4(mdo): ting 'dzin gyod yul bsam gtan zas can 'gyur// ga'i btim chen po la ni bang zing lus myi srid/ sems can don du kha zas nam stobs phyir myin// 'chi byed don du de ni chos kyi srog kyang 'tshod
297b5(mdo): 'phags pa'i tshul ni rtag bsrung shi nad tu rab tu zhi// 'dod chag/ sa zhe sdang mun tshogs shi nad tu rnam par phye// bslab pa sbed/ par gnas shing rgod myed mthun par shes// mkhas pa bdag stong
297b6(mdo): gtong byed kyi sdig pa byed ma yin// rdzu 'phrul gis ni bye ba phrag mang zhing song nas// sems can lus kyang mthun par byas te chos kyang ston de// 'gro ba'i gzugs dang mtshan dang rtags ni ji 'dra ba// de'i lus ni// 
297b7(mdo): de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur// de'i lus la shi nang tu rnam dag 'od byung ste// des ni phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas zhing rnams khyab par byed// de'i 'od de bsod nams gzil ldan reg na 'jam// srog chags
297b8(mdo): nyon mongs rdub pa thams cad zhi bar byed// sems dmyal gnas na sems can brgya dag sdug bsngal ba// de dag 'od kyis reg ma thag tu bde bar gyur// lus dang yid kyang dka' bar 'gyur ba rtag tu 'jos
298a1(mdo): de ni sems can dmyal bas rab tu tha dad pa'i rgyu// 'di dag dang ni gzhan yang lus las yongs sbyang ba// mtha' yas las rnams ye shes kyis ni rnam par phye// mkhas pa shi nang tu rdul ba
298a2(mdo): sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// rdul bral rnams kyi lus kyi las ni de 'dra'o// de dag tshig ni rnam dag sba sa na yid du 'ong // des ni lha dang lha myin 'gro kun tshim par byed// de smra ba na 'chang pa don myed myi 'gyur te/ 
298a3(mdo): theg pa bdud rtsi 'dus byas myin 'dir nges par 'byung // ngag las ngag gi nyes pa nyes mang gang yod pa// de dag de'i phyir bsod nams dag pas kun tu 'chad// skad rnams mtshungs shing sgra mtshungs gyurang bar
298a4(mdo): sems can rnams// sgra skad dag las ji snyed kun gyis tshim par byed// de'i ngag ni phyad cing mnyam la yang dag nyid// yang dag yu stond bsgribs pa myed cing mnyam par gzhag// tshig gang
298a5(mdo): smras pa de yang de bzhin 'gyur ba ste/ bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i / shes pas shin tu dag/ tha ba myed cing snyan la 'dod cha chag/ sa rab tu zhi// tshar bcad yon tan smra zhing skyon las shin
298a6(mdo): tu grol// zab cing gting dpag dka' la shi nang tu chad pa ste/ don rnams byed cing zhing stong ba dag tu khyab par byed// rtog pa mye da par tshig 'di rab tu smra bar byed// rang gi ngang gis khyab nas/ 
298a7(mdo): ji ltar ba nga kya rang swA// rtag tus bzhin sems can dbang po tshim par byed// rnam par srung byed tshig mchog 'di ni shes par byas// 'di'i yid las rtag tu bsgribs myed legs par byas// sems
298a8(mdo): kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems can rnams// de ni g.yeng byed ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa byed// rgya mchog de'i rgyu ba bdud kyis shes ma yin/ de'i sems yid rnam rtog shi nang tu zab pa ste
298b1(mdo): rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis shes par dka'// bdag dang gzhan la rnam par myi 'tshe rjes 'chags byed// khong 'gro byed cing khengs pa myed de mnyam pa'i blo// mkhas pa de ni 'gro la rigs bzhin
298b2(mdo): shes pa 'jug/ tshor ba ma yin sems dpa' ma yin rnam rtog myin// 'chi myed don du byang chub gnas su phyi nad par du// tshor ba 'gog la bde bar rtog par byed ma yin// chos bcu de dag gsol rtag
298b3(mdo): tu dag gyur pa// khyu mchog de la ting 'dzin de ni mngon du gyur / gra che 'dug pa'i spyod pa rnam par sbyangs gyur da pra// dkar po'i las rnams kun gyis 'phags shing yongs su dag / sa rnams/
